TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XmlSchemaInference extends System.Object

summary.span: 从 XML 文档中推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from an XML document.
The class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > - 不要使用来自未知或不受信任的源或位置的架构。Do not use schemas from unknown or untrusted sources or locations. 这样做会破坏代码的安全性。Doing so will compromise the security of your code. > - XML 架构（包括内联架构）本质上容易受到拒绝服务攻击;不要在不受信任的情况下接受它们。XML schemas (including inline schemas) are inherently vulnerable to denial of service attacks; do not accept them in untrusted scenarios. > - 架构验证错误消息和异常可能会向架构文件公开有关内容模型或 URI 路径的敏感信息。Schema validation error messages and exceptions may expose sensitive information about the content model or URI paths to the schema file. 请注意不要向不受信任的调用方公开此信息。Be careful not to expose this information to untrusted callers. 使用 命名空间中的 类，您可以从 XML 文档的结构推断 XML 架构定义语言（XSD）架构。The class in the namespace allows you to infer an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the structure of an XML document. 类输出的 XML 架构可以验证 XML 文档。The class outputs an XML schema that can validate the XML document. 类支持 W3C XML 和 XML 架构标准。The class supports the W3C XML and XML Schemas standards. 它可用于推断新架构或优化现有架构。It can be used to infer a new schema or to refine an existing schema. ## Examples 此示例使用 XML 文件作为输入，并生成一个可验证示例 XML 的架构。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 下面是输入 XML 文件。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 下面是从 XML 文档推断的架构。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 从指定的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document specified.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader) As XmlSchemaSet

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 对象，该对象包含要从其推理出架构的 XML 文档。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

summary.span: 从指定的 对象包含的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified.

returns.span: 对象，该对象包含推理出的架构。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的 对象中包含的 XML 实例文档中推断出一个或多个 W3C XML 架构定义语言（XSD）架构。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文档包含多个命名空间中的元素和属性，则会生成多个架构：一个用于文档中使用的每个命名空间。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, then multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主架构是可以验证整个 XML 文档的架构，其目标命名空间与 XML 文档的文档元素的命名空间相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法忽略 XML 文档中的任何 `xsi:type`、`xsi:schemaLocation`或 `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` 特性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果键入了 的对象，则将忽略它包含的类型信息。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果 对象位于不是 XML 文档的根元素的元素上，则仅针对该元素推断架构。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果 对象未定位在元素上，则 方法在 参数上调用，直到遇到元素（例如，当 为 ）时。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 此时，推理过程从该元素开始。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果在文档结束之前没有遇到元素，则会引发 。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. ## Examples 此示例使用 XML 文件作为输入，并生成一个可验证示例 XML 的架构。This example takes an XML file as input, and generates a schema that can validate the example XML. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#1)] 下面是输入 XML 文件。The following is the input XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#5)] 下面是从 XML 文档推断的架构。The following is the schema inferred from the XML document. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#6)]

exception.span: XML 文档不是格式良好的文档。

span.span: The XML document is not well-formed.

exception.span: 对象不位于根节点或元素上。

span.span: The object is not positioned on the root node or on an element.

exception.span: 架构推理过程中出现错误。

span.span: An error occurs during the schema inference process.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema (System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet InferSchema(class System.Xml.XmlReader instanceDocument, class System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSet schemas) cil managed
Public Function InferSchema (instanceDocument As XmlReader, schemas As XmlSchemaSet) As XmlSchemaSet
public: System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ InferSchema(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ instanceDocument, System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaSet ^ schemas);

param.name: instanceDocument
param.span: 对象，该对象包含要从其推理出架构的 XML 文档。

span.span: An object containing the XML document to infer a schema from.

param.name: schemas
param.span: 对象，包含用于精炼推理出的架构的现有架构。

span.span: An object containing an existing schema used to refine the inferred schema.

summary.span: 从指定的 对象包含的 XML 文档推理出 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构，并通过用相同目标命名空间指定的 对象中的现有架构精炼已推理出的架构。

span.span: Infers an XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schema from the XML document contained in the object specified, and refines the inferred schema using an existing schema in the object specified with the same target namespace.

returns.span: 对象，该对象包含推理出的架构。

span.span: An object containing the inferred schemas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的 对象中包含的 XML 实例文档中推断出一个或多个 W3C XML 架构定义语言（XSD）架构。The method infers one or more W3C XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) schemas from the XML instance document contained in the object specified. 如果 XML 文档包含多个命名空间中的元素和属性，则会生成多个架构：一个用于文档中使用的每个命名空间。If the XML document contains elements and attributes from multiple namespaces, multiple schemas are generated: one for each namespace used in the document. 主架构是可以验证整个 XML 文档的架构，其目标命名空间与 XML 文档的文档元素的命名空间相同。The primary schema is the schema that can validate the entire XML document, and its target namespace is the same as the namespace of the document element of the XML document. 下面是使用 方法时要考虑的重要注意事项。The following are important notes to consider when using the method. - 方法忽略 XML 文档中的任何 `xsi:type`、`xsi:schemaLocation`或 `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` 特性。The method ignores any `xsi:type`, `xsi:schemaLocation`, or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attributes in the XML document. - 如果键入了 的对象，则将忽略它包含的类型信息。If the object is typed, the type information it contains is ignored. - 如果 对象位于不是 XML 文档的根元素的元素上，则仅针对该元素推断架构。If the object is positioned on an element that is not the root element of the XML document, a schema is inferred for only that element. 如果 对象未定位在元素上，则 方法在 参数上调用，直到遇到元素（例如，当 为 ）时。If the object is not positioned on an element, the method is called on the parameter until an element is encountered (for example, when is ). 此时，推理过程从该元素开始。At this point, the inference process starts from that element. 如果在文档结束之前没有遇到元素，则会引发 。If no element is encountered until the end of the document, an is thrown. - 如果 对象作为参数传递，并且 对象所定位到的元素是在 的某个架构中定义的，则将使用推理的架构来优化具有相同目标命名空间的 参数中的现有架构;否则，将为命名空间推断新架构。If an object is passed as a parameter and the element upon which the object is positioned is defined in one of the schemas in the , the inferred schema is used to refine an existing schema in the parameter with the same target namespace; otherwise, a new schema is inferred for the namespace. ## Examples 下面的示例代码将 XML 文档1作为输入，并生成一个可验证 XML 文档1的架构。The following example code takes XML document 1 as an input and generates a schema that can validate XML document 1. 然后，该示例代码将使用 XML 文档2，并根据 XML 文档2中找到的更改优化从 XML 文档1生成的架构。The example code then takes XML document 2 and refines the schema generated from XML document 1, based on the changes found in XML document 2. 下面是 XML 文档1。The following is XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item1.xml#13)] 下面是 XML document 2。The following is XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#14](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/item2.xml#14)] 下面的示例代码从 `reader`中包含的第一个 XML 文档推断架构，然后使用 `reader1`中包含的第二个 XML 文档中的更改来精炼推断的架构。The following example code infers a schema from the first XML document contained in `reader`, and then refines the inferred schema with the changes found in the second XML document contained in `reader1`. 示例代码使用第一个重载 方法来推断架构，并使用第二个重载的 方法来完善 对象中的现有架构。The example code uses the first overloaded method to infer the schema, and the second overloaded method to refine the existing schema in the object. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#4)] 以下架构是从 XML 文档1推断的架构。The following schema is the schema inferred from XML document 1. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#15](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema1.xml#15)] 以下架构是基于 XML 文档2的上述架构的优化版本。The following schema is the refined version of the schema above, based on XML document 2. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#16](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/InferSchema2.xml#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption Occurrence { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 值，该值影响从 XML 文档推理出的架构匹配项声明。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects schema occurrence declarations inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 属性设置为 ，则在 XML 文档中第一次遇到元素时，架构声明将推断为 `minOccurs="1"`。If the property is set to , the first time elements are encountered in the XML document, the schema declaration is inferred as `minOccurs="1"`. 如果遇到属性，架构声明将推断为 `use="required"`。When attributes are encountered, the schema declaration is inferred as `use="required"`. 如果 属性设置为 ，则会将元素架构声明推断为 `minOccurs="0"`，并将属性架构声明推断为 `use="optional"`。If the property is set to , element schema declarations are inferred as `minOccurs="0"`, and attribute schema declarations are inferred as `use="optional"`. 属性的默认值为 。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此示例演示了具体情况如何受到 属性的影响。This example illustrates how occurrence is affected by the property. 示例代码以两种不同的方式从 XML 文件推断出现：宽松和限制。The example code infers occurrence from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 下面是示例 XML 文件。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence1.xml#7)] 下面的示例代码指示 类按宽松方式推断元素和属性的出现。The following example code instructs the class to infer occurrence of elements and attributes in a relaxed way. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#2)] 由于 属性设置为 ，因此生成了以下架构。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence2.xml#8)] 在上面的示例代码中，如果 属性未设置为 ，则 类将默认为 并生成以下架构。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/Occurrence3.xml#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption TypeInference { System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption get(); void set(System::Xml::Schema::XmlSchemaInference::InferenceOption value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置影响从 XML 文档推理出的类型的 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value that affects types inferred from the XML document.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 ，则始终 `xs:string`在带有简单内容的 XML 文档中推断出的元素和属性的类型。If the property is set to , the inferred type of elements and attributes in the XML document with simple content is always `xs:string`. 如果 属性设置为 ，则会推断出更具体的类型，如 `xs:date`、`xs:decimal`、`xs:unsignedByte`等。If the property is set to , more specific types are inferred, such as `xs:date`, `xs:decimal`, `xs:unsignedByte`, and so on. 属性的默认值为 。The default value of the property is . ## Examples 此示例阐释了类型推理如何受 属性的影响。This example illustrates how type inference is affected by the property. 示例代码以两种不同的方式从 XML 文件推断类型：宽松和受限。The example code infers types from an XML file in two different ways: relaxed and restricted. 下面是示例 XML 文件。The following is the example XML file. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#10](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference1.xml#10)] 下面的示例代码指示 类推断具有简单内容的元素和属性 `xs:string`。The following example code instructs the class to infer `xs:string` for elements and attributes with simple content. [!code-cpp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CPP/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/CS/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/VB/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples.vb#3)] 由于 属性设置为 ，因此生成了以下架构。Because the property was set to , the following schema was generated. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference2.xml#11)] 在上面的示例代码中，如果 属性未设置为 ，则 类将默认为 并生成以下架构。In the example code above, if the property was not set to , the class would have defaulted to and generated the following schema. [!code-xml[XmlSchemaInferenceExamples#12](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaInferenceExamples/XML/TypeInference3.xml#12)]
